title: Did Same-Sex Kiss in Cadbury Ad Spark Angry Petition?
subtitle: An online petition claimed two men sharing a chocolate in a Cadbury advertisement was "selling sex to children."
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: A petition that circulated in mid-February 2021 sought the withdrawal of a so-called “disgusting and off-putting” Cadbury egg advertisement featuring a same-sex couple.
